sentence.Network_en: In 1969 a ( 51 mm ) bituminous concrete overlay was placed on the concrete deck.

sentence.Network_cn: 在全国所有的工人中,可能烟煤矿工不满的理由最充分.

sentence.Network_cn: 尺寸稳定,沥青浸渍性好.
